title: "‘Creative’ Facial Verification with Generative Adversarial Networks"
excerpt: "A new paper from Stanford University has proposed a nascent method for fooling facial authentication systems in platforms such as dating apps, by using a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) to create alternative face images that contain the same essential ID information as a real face."
